page.title: 03South Brent Primary School
page.content:
The school is described by 2 of its children:
The Headmaster is Mr JC Wain. There are 7 teachers and 7 other staff. There are 215 children at present, 134 juniors and 81 infants. That makes 4 junior and 3 infant classes. We work from 9am to 3.35pm (3.30 for infants), Monday to Friday. Some staff run activities after school. There is a football club,a netball club, 2 guitar clubs, badminton and table tennis clubs and a choir. Holidays are: Christmas,Easter,Summer, Bank holidays,half terms. Total about 15 weeks. Once a year the juniors and infants each do a play. For lunch you can go home, have a packed lunch or school dinner.
